name: The Trash Talking Demon King
description:
DISCLAIMER: Some could find the insults offensive

As the villain of "I was reincarnated as a cactus", you felt that defeating a cactus would would be quite easy. However, in true anime fashion, the protagonist uses his "Power of Friendship" once he has been dealt a grave injury. The only way to stop him is to interrupt his dramatic flashback, which is the source of every protagonist's power.

This game was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 114. The theme was "Anime", and the limitation was "Locked in Place". I felt this gave me the perfect opportunity to make fun of a few common tropes in anime, such as the protagonist having a dramatic flashback, while the villain waits patiently. Your character is anything but patient.
